title: Barrister Aqeel pays tribute to Captain Muhammad Sarwar Shaheed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 27 (APP):Advisor to the Ministry of Law and Justice, Barrister Aqeel Malik on Saturday paid tribute to Captain Muhammad Sarwar Shaheed Nishan-e-Haider on his  76th martyrdom anniversary.
“Martyrs’ sacrifices are never forgotten. Those who gave their lives for our safety are our national heroes,” he said in a statement.
He urged the youth to honour these martyrs and serve the homeland as true patriots.
